subject: Hockey, Ice
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Rangers acquired John Scott from the Blackhawks, but over all N.H.L. clubs made only 16 trades involving 32 players, the lowest combined totals on deadline day since 2000.
snippet: The Rangers acquired John Scott from the Blackhawks, but over all N.H.L. clubs made only 16 trades involving 32 players, the lowest combined totals on deadline day since 2000.
